post.title: Start At The Beginning...
post.author: Kyle
post.content:
Here it is; the first post.

This website has been a long time coming. The first ideas for it's creation came about a year and a half ago, not long after I began my journey into coding.

After initially bouncing right off of basic web development writing HTML and CSS, with a touch on Bootstrap, I went away and practiced C# for a year or so. Then I found React.

This whole site is based on the Create-React-App template, with a few NPM modules imported to add some little bits of functionality.
